original_text: You have not only done wrong things, you have also turned against God. You have shown that you do not respect us. You have said many things that insult God.’ You have not only done wrong things,
korean_text: 그가 그의 죄에 반역을 더하며 우리와 어울려 손뼉을 치며 하나님을 거역하는 말을 많이 하는구나

sentences.original_text: You have not only done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 잘못된 일을 했을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: you have also turned against God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 거역했습니다

sentences.original_text: You have shown that you do not respect us
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 우리를 존중하지 않음을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: You have said many things that insult God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 하나님을 모독하는 많은 말을 했습니다
